steps: Whisk together all marinade ingredients. Add chicken, cover, and refrigerate 4-6 hours (or minimum 1 hour). Remove from fridge 30 minutes before cooking

Heat cast iron skillet or heavy skillet over high heat. Add 1 tsp oil, then cook half the chicken 3-5 minutes per side until internal temperature reaches 160Â°F. Rest several minutes, then slice thinly. Repeat with remaining chicken
Add 1 tsp oil to skillet over high heat. Cook half the peppers and onions until sizzling and slightly charred, 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Repeat with remaining vegetables
Heat tortillas by cooking each 15 seconds per side over a burner or in a dry skillet until puffed
Serve sliced chicken and vegetables with warm tortillas and toppings so diners can assemble their own
title: Chicken Fajitas
